ent.origin: Mid 16th century: of unknown origin, perhaps from Low German.

p.def: A small to medium-sized primate that typically has a long tail, most kinds of which live in trees in tropical countries.
p.eg: It was a place where you can see wild monkeys living in the trees.

p.def: (monkey about/around) Behave in a silly or playful way:
p.eg: I saw them monkeying about by the shop

ent.rhy: chunky, clunky, flunkey, funky, hunky, junkie, junky, punky, spunky
